Module it.polimi.ingsw.am52
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am52.model.cards

Class ItemsCounter

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.model.cards.ItemsCounter
public class ItemsCounter extends Object
Immutable class that maintains the count of all available items.

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ItemsCounter()
    Creates an items counter with no-items.
    ItemsCounter(int feathers, int inks, int vellum)
    Creates an item counter with the specified items.
    ItemsCounter(Item item)
    Creates an item counter with the counter of the specified item set to one (1), and all other counter set to zero (0).

  • Method Details

    • add

      public static ItemsCounter add(ItemsCounter i1, ItemsCounter i2)
      Add together two items counters and return a new resource counter with the sum of each resource.
      Parameters:
      i1 - The first item counter.
      i2 - The second item counter.
      Returns:
      A new item counter with the sum of each item.

    • subtract

      public static ItemsCounter subtract(ItemsCounter i1, ItemsCounter i2)
      Subtract together two items counters and return a new items counter with the result of the calculation.
      Parameters:
      i1 - The first items counter.
      i2 - The second items counter.
      Returns:
      A new items counter with the result of subtracting the second counter from the first counter.
